html: 4.1.19  2:26 pm   I've been having a way higher than usual number of dreams lately involving random people from my past who I no longer have contact with (e.g. people who have died, old kindergarten classmates and teachers, old friends who I've fallen out with and haven't spoken to in months or years). It's wigging me out a bit if I'm being honest. Do you have any advice? I would really appreciate it.
